tool_description: Searches for expired and expiring domains based on keywords, categories, and quality metrics for acquisition opportunities.

search_keywords.description: Keywords to search for in expired domains

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

tld_filter.description: TLD extensions to include in search

exclude_trademark.description: Whether to exclude domains with potential trademark issues

expiry_status.description: Domain status: expired, expiring_soon, in_auction, deleted

error_messages: Invalid search keywords: Provide 1-10 non-empty keyword strings.
Invalid domain age: Minimum age must be 0 or greater.
Invalid max results: Must be between 1 and 500 results.
Invalid TLD filter: Provide valid TLD extensions starting with a dot.
Invalid expiry status: Use expired, expiring_soon, in_auction, or deleted.
Search service unavailable: Expired domain database temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide search_keywords to find expired domains. Customize filters for domain_age_min, tld_filter, min_backlinks, and other quality metrics to find suitable acquisition targets.

found_domains.description: List of expired domains matching search criteria

domain_metrics.description: Quality metrics for each found domain (age, backlinks, traffic)

auction_info.description: Auction details for domains in auction status

total_found.description: Total number of domains found matching criteria
